Bat-Probe:

A bat probe arrived to CF, it landed and find a place to hide. The 
probe saw Megaton chatting with Slayer and sent a menssage to 
BlackFortress.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Megaton glares down at Slayer, taking a quick glance at Zoe now and 
again.
> "Why does it always seem to be wolves that give me problems?" he 
thinks
> knowing that the only real opponent he'd had so far was Lunarpine.
> 
> "I'll be sporting and give you till the count of three to turn tail 
and
> run." He stares keeping his poker face. The dragon raises a large 
scaled
> claw and holds up the first claw "1"
> 
> "Without giving another warning he snaps his jaws forward at about 
waist
> level trying to bite Slayer in half. (Since Slayers a TM it would 
probably
> take more than one bite, either that or give him heartburn)
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: <Yanshosh@a...>
> To: <nbwrpg@y...>
> Sent: Friday, March 30, 2001 6:01 PM
> Subject: Re: Megatons chance for glory.
> 
> 
> > ::Slayer::
> >
> > Slayer growls at Megaton, knowing that he'd probably have to fight
> > this bot.
> >
> > "A Predacon saving the Maximals? How pathetic." He says, watching
> > Megaton carefully.
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> > > Megaton scanned through the files he'd read at the predacon 
base to
> > find a
> > > match. When he did it didn't make sense. The predacon files 
listed
> > this bot
> > > as Striker Maximal combat leader.
> > >
> > > "You must be a brave bot challengeing an entire ship with your 
toy
> > missles."
> > > The dragon complimented Slayer when the transmetal bot stepped 
into
> > view.
> > >
> > > He looked around again noticing that there were no other bots in
> > the area.
> > > "Let me rephrase that" he began again "You must be a fool to 
come
> > here with
> > > your little friend." He lowered his head to Slayers level 
blowing a
> > puff of
> > > smoke in the smaller bots face. "My only challenge is to decide 
who
> > to eat
> > > first."
> >
> >
